segments.text: My gaze is drawn immediately to the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is wide open, gushing water into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just full; it's actively spilling over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A continuous sheet of water is flowing onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then it spreads out onto the kitchen floor, forming a growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, standing right there, seems utterly oblivious to this aquatic disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in the puddle, yet she continues drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the cold water seeping into her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of the running water alone should be a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the damage this water is causing to the wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This calm exterior of hers is quite concerning given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR
